May 13, 1995 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo horn Pontypool. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 10, 2012, 8:48 p.m. July 1, 2020, 9:20 a.m.
1 Pontypool Brass John Evans
2 Ammanford Silver Band Gerald Roberts
3 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
4 Newport Borough Band John Burns
5 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Alan Bourne
6 Newtown Silver Band (Wales) Steve Edwards
Withdrawn Aberystwyth B.L Alan Phillips
Withdrawn Cwmbran Band Unknown
